sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <connected-view v-slot="data" class="app-main">

      <status_panel @subscribeToFields="data.subscribeToFields" @updateData="data.updateChildData"
                    :canUpdate="data.canUpdateChildData" :connected="data.connected"></status_panel>

      <batt_detailed @subscribeToFields="data.subscribeToFields" @updateData="data.updateChildData" :canUpdate="data.canUpdateChildData"></batt_detailed>

    </connected-view>

    <b-modal id="modal" ref="modal" centered title="modal" v-model="modal.hide" hide-backdrop>
        <b-button @click="modal.hide = !modal.hide">Close</b-button>
        <b-button variant="primary" @click="addFAQ">Add</b-button>
    </b-modal>

  </section>
</template>

<script>

import ConnectedView from "@/views/ConnectedView";
import batt_summary from "@/components/Battery/Batt_summary";
import batt_detailed from "@/components/Battery/Battery_detailed";
import Status_panel from "@/components/Home/Status_panel";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  components: {Status_panel: Status_panel, ConnectedView, batt_detailed},
  setup: function () {
  }

}

</script>

<style scoped>
.app-main{
  background: var(--primary);
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 20px;
}

::v-deep(h1) {
  font-size: 2rem;
}

::v-deep(h4) {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

h1 {
  grid-column: 2;
  grid-row: 1;
}

status_panel {
  grid-column: 1;
  grid-row: 1;
}

.plugin {
  border: 2px solid var(--primary-dark);
}

</style>
